amendment.description: To delist the lesser prairie-chicken as a threatened species under the Endangered Species Act of 1973.

vote.text: Amendment SA 73, under the order of 1/27/2015, not having achieved 60 votes in the affirmative, was not agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 54 - 44. Record Vote Number: 35.

action.text: Amendment SA 73 proposed by Senator Moran to Amendment SA 2. (consideration: CR S401-402, S403-404; text: CR S402) To delist the lesser prairie-chicken as a threatened species under the Endangered Species Act of 1973.

Senate amendment not agreed to: Amendment SA 73, under the order of 1/27/2015, not having achieved 60 votes in the affirmative, was not agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 54 - 44. Record Vote Number: 35.

Roll call votes on amendments in Senate: Amendment SA 73, under the order of 1/27/2015, not having achieved 60 votes in the affirmative, was not agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 54 - 44. Record Vote Number: 35.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 73 proposed by Senator Moran to Amendment SA 2.
